birthday.subject: Medicare Options for Your Birthday Period - CA
birthday.body:
Dear John Doe,

Your birthday (February 29, 2024) is approaching, which means you have a special enrollment period to review your Medicare coverage options.

During this time, you can:
- Compare Medicare Advantage plans
- Switch to a different plan
- Enroll in a new plan

Would you like to schedule a review of your options? Please call us at (800) 555-1234 to speak with a licensed agent.

Best regards,
The Medicare Services Team

effective_date.subject: Your Medicare Coverage Anniversary is Coming Up - CA
effective_date.body:
Dear John Doe,

Your Medicare plan anniversary is approaching. This is a good time to review your coverage and ensure it still meets your needs.

You may be eligible to:
- Update your prescription drug coverage
- Switch between Medicare Advantage and Original Medicare
- Add or change supplemental coverage

Would you like to schedule a review? Please call us at (800) 555-1234.

Best regards,
The Medicare Services Team

aep.subject: Medicare Annual Enrollment Period is Coming - CA
aep.body:
Dear John Doe,

The Medicare Annual Enrollment Period (October 15, 2024 - December 07, 2024) is approaching. During this time, all Medicare beneficiaries can make changes to their coverage.

This is your opportunity to:
- Switch between Medicare Advantage and Original Medicare
- Change your prescription drug coverage
- Join, switch, or drop a Medicare Advantage Plan

We recommend scheduling a review before the rush. Call us at (800) 555-1234.

Best regards,
The Medicare Services Team

post_window.subject: Medicare Special Enrollment Period Has Ended - CA
post_window.body:
Dear John Doe,

Your recent Medicare Special Enrollment Period has ended. If you made changes to your coverage, they should now be in effect.

Even though this enrollment period has ended, you may still qualify for other special enrollment periods if you experience certain life events.

If you have any questions about your current coverage or future options, please call us at (800) 555-1234.

Best regards,
The Medicare Services Team
